fields.Title: DOOMED / FREQUENCY FIREPLACE
fields.Description: Different radio frequencies cover the fireplace like Kedran mosaic tiles.

fields.Title: START
input
Conceptualization: "A conductor for the hundreds of sto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A conductor for the hundreds of story threads that pass through the Game Master's Frequency.

fields.Title: Frequency Fireplace: "Unclear. It looks like a cardiovasc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unclear. It looks like a cardiovascular system, split into veins and capillaries. Very advanced.

fields.Title: Frequency Fireplace: "Radio frequencies, it seems. UKV123..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Radio frequencies, it seems. UKV123.6, UKV123.7, UKV123.9... some written notes too. Sparse and cryptic.

fields.Title: Authority: "The leader of a massive on-air game..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The leader of a massive on-air game built by these people.

fields.Title: You: "What am I looking at?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What am I looking at?

fields.Title: You: "Wait, who's the Game Master?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, who's the Game Master?

fields.Title: You: "This must be an elaborate piece of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This must be an elaborate piece of art.

fields.Title: Frequency Fireplace: "This old fireplace is covered in li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This old fireplace is covered in lines drawn in blue and red marker, the mesh spreading over the stone like blood vessels on alabaster skin. It looks ghostly and strangely ancient.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Looks like a surveillance programme..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like a surveillance programme...

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "A list of names under the stations..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A list of names under the stations suggests people across *six isolas* would be playing: Mundi, Insulinde, Katla, Graad, Samara, and even Iilmaraa.

fields.Title: Frequency Fireplace: "Nothing. It's just lines on marble,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing. It's just lines on marble, an echo from times long gone. No one has used the fireplace in ages.

fields.Title: You: "Hold on, how do I know what Kedran..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hold on, how do I know what Kedran mosaic tiles are supposed to look like?

fields.Title: You: ""Why do you say that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why do you say that?"

fields.Title: Variable["doomed.fortress_accident_kim_switch_done"]
Variable["doomed.fortress_accident_kim_switch_done"]
!(Variable["doomed.fortress_accident_kim_switch_done"])
Conceptualization: "History classes. Students with thei..."
fields.Dialogue Text: History classes. Students with their textbooks open, studying the roots of our civilization. Those aquarelle-blue tiles looked beautiful in the sun.

fields.Title: Frequency Fireplace: "You think so? The web is comprised..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You think so? The web is comprised of radio stations. All lead back to one red heart, titled: The Game Master Frequency. A note says: 'This one can listen in on any station it wants?!'

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My god..." The lieutenant leans cl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My god..." The lieutenant leans closer, his finger tracking the maddening rhizome. "It's as if the *less money* they had, the more ambitious their project became."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Exactly." He nods at the calendar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Exactly." He nods at the calendar on the chalkboard, wiping his marker-stained fingers clean against his jacket. "This schedule -- I know *doom* when I see it. The company was running out of funding."

fields.Title: Empathy: "All of this gone, left unrealized."
fields.Dialogue Text: All of this gone, left unrealized.

fields.Title: Frequency Fireplace: "Whoever decides to call in to a cal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whoever decides to call in to a call-in station, it looks like.

fields.Title: You: ""Mhm. The cost of airwidth alone mu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm. The cost of airwidth alone must have been huge."

fields.Title: You: "Radio frequencies for what?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Radio frequencies for what?

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The whole thing resembles Kedran mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The whole thing resembles Kedran mosaic tiles. Very Pisantic.

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Kim Kitsuragi: ""The schedule." He nods at the cale..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The schedule." He nods at the calendar on the chalkboard, wiping his marker-stained fingers clean. "I know *doom* when I see it -- the company was running out of funding."

fields.Title: You: "If it's a game, then who's playing?"
fields.Dialogue Text: If it's a game, then who's playing?

fields.Title: Logic: "There's no way a little basement st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's no way a little basement studio working *here* could pull anything like this off.

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())

fields.Title: Frequency Fireplace: "Perhaps... The web is comprised of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Perhaps... The web is comprised of radio stations. All lead back to one red heart, titled: The Game Master Frequency. A note says: 'This one can listen in on any station it wants?!'

fields.Title: You: "So we're dealing with something med..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So we're dealing with something medical here?

fields.Title: Frequency Fireplace: "Someone very important."
fields.Dialogue Text: Someone very important.

fields.Title: fireplace hub
You: "What else? (Squint at the lines.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: What else? (Squint at the lines.)

fields.Title: You: "Of course... (Narrow your eyes.) Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course... (Narrow your eyes.) The anatomy of *the curse*.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "A diagram for summoning some time-f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A diagram for summoning some time-forgotten being? The symbols seem very esoteric.

fields.Title: SetVariableValue("kimswitch.fortress_accident", true) --[[ Variable[ ]]
You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Interfacing: "They must have had *massive* airwid..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They must have had *massive* airwidth. These things don't come cheap.
